mapper.delete:
delete from channel where id in
#{id}

choose.when: select channel.avatar as avatar,channel.nick as objectNick, 'channel' as objectType, channel.id as objectId from channel where channel.nick like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or channel.id like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
choose.otherwise: select channel.avatar as avatar,channel.nick as objectNick,'channel' as objectType, channel.id as objectId from channel,channel_user where channel_user.user_id=#{userId} and channel_user.channel_id=channel.id and (channel.nick like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or channel.id like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
